quienesSomos:
SIXTAGE was founded in 2023. It emerged from the enthusiasm, commitment, and need of a group of Full Stack Web Development students.
An idea born from a common passion: the taste and love for fashion.
We rescue unique garments that should not die, garments that still have many stories to live, despite surviving the passage of time and history.
We select accessories and garments with great care and detail. Each of them represents us and makes us feel authentic and special.
Our greatest desire is to find exclusive and irreplaceable products for all of you and to know that by acquiring any of them, you are contributing to the deepest sense of sustainability and care for the only medium we cannot replace.

parrafoPop: By clicking subscribe, you are confirming that this is your information and in response to your request, you consent to receive email communications from blabla.com about our news, events, and offers. You understand that your consent is not a condition of purchase and you may opt out at any time. You also agree to our Terms of Use and the use of your information as set forth in our Privacy Policy.
textoContacto: Whether you're curious about our service, a free trial, or even free press, we're ready to answer each and every one of your questions.
